A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What is this s**t?! Right now users gave The Last Jedi a 56%. Have they lost their minds?!?! The Last Jedi was The Empire Strikes Back of the new trilogy! It was so good. The plot was great\, loved the characters\, John Williams score was much better\, and the CGI was fantastic. I can’t believe people would hate this. My only issues with the movie was the plot with Finn and Rose. It felt a little choppy and took away from the film. And Laura Dern’s performance wasn’t that good. Her character had no purpose\, except for one part. Other than that I loved this movie. I had the most fun (not saying it’s the best movie) in the theater watching it. I saw it twice already and it was better the first time. I hope you go out and see this marvelous film. My Grade: A-
